info.title: Games API
info.description: List games that are or will soon be available to you.

get.description:
List all games available to you or soon to be available.

Please make sure to honor the "enabled" flag. if game is listed as enabled = true it will start,if enabled = false it will not start.

supportedDenominations.description: The denominations supported by this game.

maxLines.description: Max amount of lines in a bet

fixedLines.description: If lines is fixed and cant be changed in a bet.

fixedCoins.description: If lines is fixed and cant be changed in a bet.

freeGameSupport.description: If the game supports free games.

featureBuySupport.description: If the game supports feature buy, either in game or through promotion.

earlyAccess.description: If the game is in early access, this require that the player is on the game whitelist to start.

enabled.description: If the game is enabled for you.

released.description: When the game was released or Will be released.

  • 1: Slot Game
